Posts.Content: Feb 14, 2011 04:54PM Laceyk wrote: I am going on the Breast Cancer Wellness Cruise.  Is anyone else planning to go?  I'll be traveling alone (I was able to find a roommate) due to the expense of traveling from Alaska.  It would be great to get to know some of my fellow travelers...
Posts.Title: **NEW** Starting Chemo March 2009 ginagina celia088

Posts.Content: Nov 18, 2009 12:02AM Laceyk wrote: The power port was REALLY tough.  I was not expecting that AT ALL.  I took about 3 weeks to feel better.  My dr gave my some cream to numb it up at bit.  I can still feel the wire in the vein and that is still uncomfortable.  I am still wearing loose clothing and the post surgery cami that I ordered from Pink Bra.com.  I understand that the TC chemo drugs are too strong and would damage the veins in our arms.  So, the port puts them directly into the strongest vessel.
Posts.Title: Power Port is Powerfully Painful! LRAllenM12 elenalb
